trick.name: trick
trick.description: A move that tricks the foe into trading held items with the user.

super-fang.name: super-fang
super-fang.description: The user attacks with sharp fangs and halves the foe’s HP.

reflect.name: reflect
reflect.description: A wall of light cuts damage from physical attacks for five turns.

mimic.name: mimic
mimic.description: The user copies the move last used by the foe for the rest of the battle.

sleep-powder.name: sleep-powder
sleep-powder.description: A sleep-inducing dust is scattered in high volume around a foe.

sonic-boom.name: sonic-boom
sonic-boom.description: The foe is hit with a shock wave that always inflicts 20- HP damage.

recover.name: recover
recover.description: A self-healing move that restores HP by up to half of the user’s maximum HP.

sweet-scent.name: sweet-scent
sweet-scent.description: Allures the foe to reduce evasiveness. It also attracts wild Pokémon.

bite.name: bite
bite.description: The user bites with vicious fangs. It may make the foe flinch.

quick-attack.name: quick-attack
quick-attack.description: An almost invisibly fast attack that is certain to strike first.

amnesia.name: amnesia
amnesia.description: Forgets about something and sharply raises SP. DEF.

curse.name: curse
curse.description: A move that works differently for the GHOST-type and all the other types.

uproar.name: uproar
uproar.description: The user attacks in an uproar that prevents sleep for two to five turns.

ice-beam.name: ice-beam
ice-beam.description: The foe is struck with an icy beam. It may freeze the foe solid.

mud-sport.name: mud-sport
mud-sport.description: Weakens ELECTRIC- type attacks while the user is in the battle.

calm-mind.name: calm-mind
calm-mind.description: The user focuses its mind to raise the SP. ATK and SP. DEF stats.

harden.name: harden
harden.description: The user stiffens all the muscles in its body to raise its DEFENSE stat.

headbutt.name: headbutt
headbutt.description: The user sticks its head out and rams. It may make the foe flinch.

sing.name: sing
sing.description: A soothing song in a calming voice lulls the foe into a deep slumber.

follow-me.name: follow-me
follow-me.description: The user draws attention to itself, making foes attack only the user.

agility.name: agility
agility.description: The user relaxes and lightens its body to sharply boost its SPEED.

aurora-beam.name: aurora-beam
aurora-beam.description: A rainbow-colored attack beam. It may lower the foe’s ATTACK stat.

spore.name: spore
spore.description: The user scatters bursts of fine spores that induce sleep.

egg-bomb.name: egg-bomb
egg-bomb.description: A large egg is hurled with great force at the foe to inflict damage.

bonemerang.name: bonemerang
bonemerang.description: The user throws a bone that hits the foe once, then once again on return.

teleport.name: teleport
teleport.description: Use it to flee from any wild Pokémon. Also warps to the last POKé CENTER.

mind-reader.name: mind-reader
mind-reader.description: The user predicts the foe’s action to ensure its next attack hits.

comet-punch.name: comet-punch
comet-punch.description: The foe is hit with a flurry of punches that strike two to five times.

feather-dance.name: feather-dance
feather-dance.description: The foe is covered with a mass of down that sharply cuts the ATTACK stat.

astonish.name: astonish
astonish.description: An attack using a startling shout. It also may make the foe flinch.

outrage.name: outrage
outrage.description: The user thrashes about for two to three turns, then becomes confused.

mirror-coat.name: mirror-coat
mirror-coat.description: A retaliation move that pays back the foe’s special attack double.

superpower.name: superpower
superpower.description: A powerful attack, but it also lowers the user’s ATTACK and DEFENSE stats.

cross-chop.name: cross-chop
cross-chop.description: The foe is hit with double chops. It has a high critical-hit ratio.

rock-throw.name: rock-throw
rock-throw.description: The foe is attacked with a shower of small, easily thrown rocks.

safeguard.name: safeguard
safeguard.description: It protects the user’s party from all status problems for five turns.

splash.name: splash
splash.description: The user just flops and splashes around without having any effect.

helping-hand.name: helping-hand
helping-hand.description: A move that boosts the power of the ally’s attack in a battle.

wing-attack.name: wing-attack
wing-attack.description: The foe is struck with large, imposing wings spread wide.

water-gun.name: water-gun
water-gun.description: The foe is struck with a lot of water expelled forcibly from the mouth.

pin-missile.name: pin-missile
pin-missile.description: Sharp pins are shot at the foe and hit two to five times at once.

hyper-fang.name: hyper-fang
hyper-fang.description: The foe is attacked with sharp fangs. It may make the foe flinch.

thrash.name: thrash
thrash.description: The user rampages about for two to three turns, then becomes confused.

bind.name: bind
bind.description: A long body or tentacles are used to bind the foe for two to five turns.

reversal.name: reversal
reversal.description: An all-out attack that becomes more powerful the less HP the user has.

rain-dance.name: rain-dance
rain-dance.description: A heavy rain falls for five turns, powering up WATER- type moves.

horn-attack.name: horn-attack
horn-attack.description: The foe is jabbed with a sharply pointed horn to inflict damage.

double-edge.name: double-edge
double-edge.description: A reckless, life- risking tackle that also hurts the user a little.

spit-up.name: spit-up
spit-up.description: The power built using STOCKPILE is released at once for attack.

grudge.name: grudge
grudge.description: If the user faints, this move deletes the PP of the move that finished it.

mean-look.name: mean-look
mean-look.description: The foe is fixed with a mean look that prevents it from escaping.

magnitude.name: magnitude
magnitude.description: A ground-shaking attack against all standing Pokémon. Its power varies.

memento.name: memento
memento.description: The user faints, but sharply lowers the foe’s ATTACK and SP. ATK.

conversion.name: conversion
conversion.description: The user changes its type to match the type of one of its moves.

rollout.name: rollout
rollout.description: A 5-turn rolling attack that becomes stronger each time it hits.

double-team.name: double-team
double-team.description: The user creates illusory copies of itself to raise its evasiveness.

self-destruct.name: self-destruct
self-destruct.description: The user blows up to inflict severe damage, even making itself faint.

waterfall.name: waterfall
waterfall.description: A powerful charge attack. It can also be used to climb a waterfall.

submission.name: submission
submission.description: A reckless, full- body throw attack that also hurts the user a little.

fire-blast.name: fire-blast
fire-blast.description: The foe is hit with an intense flame. It may leave the target with a burn.

growth.name: growth
growth.description: The user’s body is forced to grow, raising the SP. ATK stat.

swift.name: swift
swift.description: Star-shaped rays that never miss are fired at all foes in battle.

encore.name: encore
encore.description: Makes the foe use the move it last used repeatedly for two to six turns.

baton-pass.name: baton-pass
baton-pass.description: The user switches out, passing along any stat changes to the new battler.

sandstorm.name: sandstorm
sandstorm.description: A 5-turn sandstorm that damages all types except ROCK, GROUND, and STEEL.

synthesis.name: synthesis
synthesis.description: Restores the user’s HP. The amount of HP regained varies with the weather.

water-sport.name: water-sport
water-sport.description: Weakens FIRE-type attacks while the user is in the battle.

scary-face.name: scary-face
scary-face.description: Frightens the foe with a scary face to sharply reduce its SPEED.

mach-punch.name: mach-punch
mach-punch.description: A punch thrown at blinding speed. It is certain to strike first.

leech-life.name: leech-life
leech-life.description: An attack that absorbs half the damage it inflicted to restore HP.

psychic.name: psychic
psychic.description: A strong telekinetic attack. It may also lower the foe’s SP. DEF stat.

stomp.name: stomp
stomp.description: The foe is stomped with a big foot. It may make the foe flinch.

rage.name: rage
rage.description: An attack that becomes stronger each time the user is hit in battle.

swallow.name: swallow
swallow.description: The energy it built using STOCKPILE is absorbed to restore HP.

earthquake.name: earthquake
earthquake.description: An earthquake that strikes all Pokémon in battle excluding the user.

pay-day.name: pay-day
pay-day.description: Numerous coins are hurled at the foe. Money is earned after battle.

charge.name: charge
charge.description: The user charges power to boost the ELECTRIC move it uses next.

sky-uppercut.name: sky-uppercut
sky-uppercut.description: The user attacks with an uppercut thrown skywards with force.

sky-attack.name: sky-attack
sky-attack.description: A 2nd-turn attack move with a high critical-hit ratio. The foe may flinch.

confusion.name: confusion
confusion.description: A weak telekinetic attack that may also leave the foe confused.

psybeam.name: psybeam
psybeam.description: A peculiar ray is shot at the foe. It may leave the foe confused.

vice-grip.name: vice-grip
vice-grip.description: Huge, impressive pincers grip and squeeze the foe.

extreme-speed.name: extreme-speed
extreme-speed.description: A blindingly speedy charge attack that always goes before any other.

jump-kick.name: jump-kick
jump-kick.description: The user jumps up high, then kicks. If it misses, the user hurts itself.

camouflage.name: camouflage
camouflage.description: Alters the user’s type depending on the location’s terrain.

horn-drill.name: horn-drill
horn-drill.description: The horn is rotated like a drill to ram. The foe will faint if it hits.

bone-rush.name: bone-rush
bone-rush.description: The user strikes the foe with a bone in hand two to five times.

thunder-shock.name: thunder-shock
thunder-shock.description: An electric shock attack that may also leave the foe paralyzed.

barrier.name: barrier
barrier.description: The user creates a sturdy wall that sharply raises its DEFENSE stat.

air-cutter.name: air-cutter
air-cutter.description: The foe is hit with razor-like wind. It has a high critical-hit ratio.

lock-on.name: lock-on
lock-on.description: The user locks on to the foe, making the next move sure to hit.

yawn.name: yawn
yawn.description: A huge yawn lulls the foe into falling asleep on the next turn.

petal-dance.name: petal-dance
petal-dance.description: The user attacks with petals for two to three turns, then gets confused.

imprison.name: imprison
imprison.description: Prevents foes from using any move that is also known by the user.

peck.name: peck
peck.description: The foe is jabbed with a sharply pointed beak or horn.

metal-sound.name: metal-sound
metal-sound.description: A horrible metallic screech is used to sharply lower the foe’s SP. DEF.

giga-drain.name: giga-drain
giga-drain.description: A harsh attack that absorbs half the damage it inflicted to restore HP.

slam.name: slam
slam.description: The foe is struck with a long tail, vines, etc.

sheer-cold.name: sheer-cold
sheer-cold.description: The foe is attacked with ultimate cold that causes fainting if it hits.

bubble.name: bubble
bubble.description: A spray of bubbles hits the foe. It may lower the foe’s SPEED stat.

mud-slap.name: mud-slap
mud-slap.description: Mud is hurled in the foe’s face to inflict damage and lower its accuracy.

aerial-ace.name: aerial-ace
aerial-ace.description: An extremely fast attack against one target. It can’t be evaded.

ember.name: ember
ember.description: The foe is attacked with small flames. The foe may suffer a burn.

barrage.name: barrage
barrage.description: Round objects are hurled at the foe to strike two to five times.

smokescreen.name: smokescreen
smokescreen.description: An obscuring cloud of smoke or ink reduces the foe’s accuracy.

lovely-kiss.name: lovely-kiss
lovely-kiss.description: The user forces a kiss on the foe with a scary face that induces sleep.

minimize.name: minimize
minimize.description: The user compresses all the cells in its body to raise its evasiveness.

mega-drain.name: mega-drain
mega-drain.description: A tough attack that drains half the damage it inflicted to restore HP.

will-o-wisp.name: will-o-wisp
will-o-wisp.description: A sinister, bluish white flame is shot at the foe to inflict a burn.

heat-wave.name: heat-wave
heat-wave.description: The user exhales a heated breath to attack. It may also inflict a burn.

zap-cannon.name: zap-cannon
zap-cannon.description: An electric blast is fired like a cannon to inflict damage and paralyze.

tackle.name: tackle
tackle.description: A physical attack in which the user charges, full body, into the foe.

rolling-kick.name: rolling-kick
rolling-kick.description: A quick kick from a rolling spin. It may make the foe flinch.

rock-blast.name: rock-blast
rock-blast.description: The user hurls two to five hard rocks at the foe to attack.

destiny-bond.name: destiny-bond
destiny-bond.description: If the user faints, the foe delivering the final hit also faints.

ice-punch.name: ice-punch
ice-punch.description: The foe is punched with an icy fist. It may leave the foe frozen.

whirlwind.name: whirlwind
whirlwind.description: The foe is made to switch out with an ally. In the wild, the battle ends.

sleep-talk.name: sleep-talk
sleep-talk.description: While asleep, the user randomly uses one of the moves it knows.

metronome.name: metronome
metronome.description: Waggles a finger and stimulates the brain into using any move at random.

covet.name: covet
covet.description: A cutely executed attack that also steals the foe’s hold item.

rapid-spin.name: rapid-spin
rapid-spin.description: An attack that frees the user from BIND, WRAP, LEECH SEED, and SPIKES.

supersonic.name: supersonic
supersonic.description: The user generates odd sound waves. It may confuse the foe.

haze.name: haze
haze.description: Eliminates all stat changes among all Pokémon engaged in battle.

substitute.name: substitute
substitute.description: The user creates a decoy using one- quarter of its full HP.

defense-curl.name: defense-curl
defense-curl.description: The user curls up to conceal weak spots and raise its DEFENSE stat.

swagger.name: swagger
swagger.description: A move that makes the foe confused, but also sharply raises its ATTACK.

double-kick.name: double-kick
double-kick.description: Two legs are used to quickly kick the foe twice in one turn.

spite.name: spite
spite.description: A move that cuts 2 to 5 PP from the move last used by the foe.

crunch.name: crunch
crunch.description: The foe is crunched with sharp fangs. It may lower the foe’s SP. DEF.

confuse-ray.name: confuse-ray
confuse-ray.description: The foe is exposed to a sinister ray that triggers confusion.

foresight.name: foresight
foresight.description: Completely negates the foe’s efforts to heighten its ability to evade.

crabhammer.name: crabhammer
crabhammer.description: A large pincer is used to hammer the foe. It has a high critical-hit ratio.

disable.name: disable
disable.description: For a few turns, it prevents the foe from using the move it last used.

dig.name: dig
dig.description: An attack that hits on the 2nd turn. Can also be used to exit dungeons.

protect.name: protect
protect.description: Enables the user to evade all attacks. It may fail if used in succession.

guillotine.name: guillotine
guillotine.description: A vicious tearing attack with pincers. The foe will faint if it hits.

pursuit.name: pursuit
pursuit.description: An attack move that works especially well on a foe that is switching out.

slash.name: slash
slash.description: The foe is slashed with claws, etc. It has a high critical-hit ratio.

acid.name: acid
acid.description: The foe is sprayed with a harsh, hide- melting acid that may lower DEFENSE.

hyper-voice.name: hyper-voice
hyper-voice.description: The user lets loose a horribly loud shout with the power to damage.

aromatherapy.name: aromatherapy
aromatherapy.description: A soothing scent is released to heal all status problems in the user’s party.

sludge-bomb.name: sludge-bomb
sludge-bomb.description: Filthy sludge is hurled at the foe. It may poison the target.

night-shade.name: night-shade
night-shade.description: An attack with a mirage that inflicts damage matching the user’s level.

leech-seed.name: leech-seed
leech-seed.description: A seed is planted on the foe to steal some HP for the  user on every turn.

wrap.name: wrap
wrap.description: A long body or vines are used to wrap the foe for two to five turns.

fire-punch.name: fire-punch
fire-punch.description: The foe is punched with a fiery fist. It may leave the foe with a burn.

clamp.name: clamp
clamp.description: The foe is clamped and squeezed by the user’s shell for two to five turns.

poison-gas.name: poison-gas
poison-gas.description: The foe is sprayed with a cloud of toxic gas that may poison the foe.

stockpile.name: stockpile
stockpile.description: The user charges up power for use later. It can be used three times.

razor-leaf.name: razor-leaf
razor-leaf.description: The foe is hit with a cutting leaf. It has a high critical-hit ratio.

flail.name: flail
flail.description: A desperate attack that becomes more powerful the less HP the user has.

counter.name: counter
counter.description: A retaliation move that counters any physical hit with double the damage.

low-kick.name: low-kick
low-kick.description: A low, tripping kick that inflicts more damage on heavier foes.

perish-song.name: perish-song
perish-song.description: Any battler that hears this faints in three turns unless it switches.

block.name: block
block.description: The user blocks the foe’s way with arms spread wide to prevent escape.

roar.name: roar
roar.description: The foe is made to switch out with an ally. In the wild, the battle ends.

pound.name: pound
pound.description: A physical attack delivered with a long tail or a foreleg, etc.

signal-beam.name: signal-beam
signal-beam.description: The foe is hit with a flashing beam that may also cause confusion.

twister.name: twister
twister.description: A vicious twister attacks the foe. It may make the foe flinch.

feint-attack.name: feint-attack
feint-attack.description: The user draws up close to the foe disarmingly, then hits without fail.

fissure.name: fissure
fissure.description: The foe is dropped into a fissure. The foe faints if it hits.

kinesis.name: kinesis
kinesis.description: The user distracts the foe by bending a spoon. It may lower accuracy.

psych-up.name: psych-up
psych-up.description: The user hypnotizes itself into copying any stat change made by the foe.

brick-break.name: brick-break
brick-break.description: An attack that also breaks any barrier like LIGHT SCREEN and REFLECT.

light-screen.name: light-screen
light-screen.description: A wall of light cuts damage from SP. ATK attacks for five turns.

poison-fang.name: poison-fang
poison-fang.description: The foe is bitten with toxic fangs. It may also badly poison the foe.

karate-chop.name: karate-chop
karate-chop.description: The foe is attacked with a sharp chop. It has a high critical-hit ratio.

meteor-mash.name: meteor-mash
meteor-mash.description: The foe is hit with a hard, fast punch. It may also raise the user’s ATTACK.

dynamic-punch.name: dynamic-punch
dynamic-punch.description: The foe is punched with the user’s full power. It confuses the foe if it hits.

transform.name: transform
transform.description: The user transforms into a copy of the foe with even the same move set.

sand-attack.name: sand-attack
sand-attack.description: A lot of sand is hurled in the foe’s face, reducing its accuracy.

solar-beam.name: solar-beam
solar-beam.description: A 2-turn move that blasts the foe with absorbed energy in the 2nd turn.

silver-wind.name: silver-wind
silver-wind.description: The foe is attacked with a silver dust. It may raise all the user’s stats.

powder-snow.name: powder-snow
powder-snow.description: Blasts the foe with a snowy gust. It may cause freezing.

vine-whip.name: vine-whip
vine-whip.description: The foe is struck with slender, whip­ like vines.

bone-club.name: bone-club
bone-club.description: The foe is clubbed with a bone held in hand. It may make the foe flinch.

focus-energy.name: focus-energy
focus-energy.description: The user takes a deep breath and focuses to raise its critical-hit ratio.

spark.name: spark
spark.description: An electrically charged tackle that may also paralyze the foe.

body-slam.name: body-slam
body-slam.description: The user drops its full body on the foe. It may leave the foe paralyzed.

role-play.name: role-play
role-play.description: The user mimics the foe completely and copies the foe’s ability.

flamethrower.name: flamethrower
flamethrower.description: The foe is scorched with intense flames. The foe may suffer a burn.

nightmare.name: nightmare
nightmare.description: A sleeping foe is shown a nightmare that inflicts some damage every turn.

snore.name: snore
snore.description: An attack that can be used only while asleep. It may cause flinching.

thunder.name: thunder
thunder.description: A brutal lightning attack that may also leave the foe paralyzed.

endeavor.name: endeavor
endeavor.description: Gains power the fewer HP the user has compared with the foe.

seismic-toss.name: seismic-toss
seismic-toss.description: A gravity-fed throw that causes damage matching the user’s level.

shadow-punch.name: shadow-punch
shadow-punch.description: The user throws a punch from the shadows. It cannot be evaded.

screech.name: screech
screech.description: An ear-splitting screech is emitted to sharply reduce the foe’s DEFENSE.

smog.name: smog
smog.description: The foe is attacked with exhaust gases. It may also poison the foe.

fire-spin.name: fire-spin
fire-spin.description: The foe is trapped in an intense spiral of fire that rages two to five turns.

tri-attack.name: tri-attack
tri-attack.description: A simultaneous 3-beam attack that may paralyze, burn, or freeze the foe.

swords-dance.name: swords-dance
swords-dance.description: A frenetic dance of fighting. It sharply raises the ATTACK stat.

soft-boiled.name: soft-boiled
soft-boiled.description: Heals the user by up to half its full HP. It can be used to heal an ally.

string-shot.name: string-shot
string-shot.description: The foe is bound with strings shot from the mouth to reduce its SPEED.

withdraw.name: withdraw
withdraw.description: The user withdraws its body in its hard shell, raising its DEFENSE stat.

fake-tears.name: fake-tears
fake-tears.description: The user feigns crying to sharply lower the foe’s SP. DEF stat.

dragon-rage.name: dragon-rage
dragon-rage.description: The foe is hit with a shock wave that always inflicts 40- HP damage.

fury-attack.name: fury-attack
fury-attack.description: The foe is jabbed repeatedly with a horn or beak two to five times.

leer.name: leer
leer.description: The foe is given an intimidating look that lowers its DEFENSE stat.

constrict.name: constrict
constrict.description: The foe is attacked with long tentacles or vines. It may lower SPEED.

lick.name: lick
lick.description: The foe is licked and hit with a long tongue. It may also paralyze.

endure.name: endure
endure.description: The user endures any hit with 1 HP left. It may fail if used in succession.

shadow-ball.name: shadow-ball
shadow-ball.description: A shadowy blob is hurled at the foe. May also lower the foe’s SP. DEF.

fury-cutter.name: fury-cutter
fury-cutter.description: An attack that grows stronger on each successive hit.

future-sight.name: future-sight
future-sight.description: Two turns after this move is used, the foe is attacked psychically.

mega-punch.name: mega-punch
mega-punch.description: The foe is slugged by a punch thrown with muscle-packed power.

mud-shot.name: mud-shot
mud-shot.description: The user attacks by hurling mud. It also reduces the foe’s SPEED.

thunder-wave.name: thunder-wave
thunder-wave.description: A weak electric shock that is sure to cause paralysis if it hits.

sand-tomb.name: sand-tomb
sand-tomb.description: The foe is trapped inside a painful sandstorm for two to five turns.

take-down.name: take-down
take-down.description: A reckless, full- body charge attack that also hurts the user a little.

acid-armor.name: acid-armor
acid-armor.description: The user alters its cells to liquefy itself and sharply raise DEFENSE.

meditate.name: meditate
meditate.description: The user meditates to awaken its power and raise its ATTACK stat.

twineedle.name: twineedle
twineedle.description: The foe is stabbed twice with foreleg stingers. It may poison the foe.

icicle-spear.name: icicle-spear
icicle-spear.description: Sharp icicles are fired at the foe. It strikes two to five times.

sludge.name: sludge
sludge.description: Toxic sludge is hurled at the foe. It may poison the target.

blizzard.name: blizzard
blizzard.description: The foe is blasted with a blizzard. It may freeze the foe solid.

flame-wheel.name: flame-wheel
flame-wheel.description: The user makes a fiery charge at the foe. It may cause a burn.

sunny-day.name: sunny-day
sunny-day.description: The sun blazes for five turns, powering up FIRE-type moves.

mist.name: mist
mist.description: The ally party is protected by a mist that prevents stat reductions.

metal-claw.name: metal-claw
metal-claw.description: The foe is attacked with steel claws. It may also raise the user’s ATTACK.

magical-leaf.name: magical-leaf
magical-leaf.description: The foe is attacked with a strange leaf that cannot be evaded.

drill-peck.name: drill-peck
drill-peck.description: A corkscrewing attack with the sharp beak acting as a drill.

skull-bash.name: skull-bash
skull-bash.description: The user raises its DEFENSE in the 1st turn, then attacks in the 2nd turn.

stun-spore.name: stun-spore
stun-spore.description: Paralyzing dust is scattered wildly. It may paralyze the foe.

odor-sleuth.name: odor-sleuth
odor-sleuth.description: Completely negates the foe’s efforts to heighten its ability to evade.

hypnosis.name: hypnosis
hypnosis.description: Hypnotic suggestion is used to make the foe fall into a deep sleep.

double-slap.name: double-slap
double-slap.description: The foe is slapped repeatedly, back and forth, two to five times.

poison-sting.name: poison-sting
poison-sting.description: The foe is stabbed with a toxic barb, etc. It may poison the foe.

mega-kick.name: mega-kick
mega-kick.description: The foe is attacked by a kick fired with muscle-packed power.

growl.name: growl
growl.description: The user growls in a cute way, making the foe lower its ATTACK stat.

recycle.name: recycle
recycle.description: A move that recycles a used item for use once more.

dragon-dance.name: dragon-dance
dragon-dance.description: A mystic, powerful dance that boosts the user’s ATTACK and SPEED stats.

poison-powder.name: poison-powder
poison-powder.description: A cloud of toxic dust is scattered. It may poison the foe.

tail-whip.name: tail-whip
tail-whip.description: The user wags its tail cutely, making the foe lower its DEFENSE stat.

rest.name: rest
rest.description: The user sleeps for two turns to fully restore HP and heal any status problem.

false-swipe.name: false-swipe
false-swipe.description: A restrained attack that always leaves the foe with at least 1 HP.

sharpen.name: sharpen
sharpen.description: The user reduces its polygon count to sharpen edges and raise ATTACK.

knock-off.name: knock-off
knock-off.description: Knocks down the foe’s held item to prevent its use during the battle.

refresh.name: refresh
refresh.description: A self-healing move that cures the user of a poisoning, burn, or paralysis.

tickle.name: tickle
tickle.description: The foe is made to laugh, reducing its ATTACK and DEFENSE stats.

detect.name: detect
detect.description: Enables the user to evade all attacks. It may fail if used in succession.

hyper-beam.name: hyper-beam
hyper-beam.description: A severely damaging attack that makes the user rest on the next turn.

hydro-pump.name: hydro-pump
hydro-pump.description: A high volume of water is blasted at the foe under great pressure.

vital-throw.name: vital-throw
vital-throw.description: Makes the user attack after the foe. In return, it will not miss.

high-jump-kick.name: high-jump-kick
high-jump-kick.description: A strong jumping knee kick. If it misses, the user is hurt.

spikes.name: spikes
spikes.description: A trap of spikes is laid around the foe’s party to hurt foes switching in.

fake-out.name: fake-out
fake-out.description: An attack that hits first and causes flinching. Usable only on 1st turn.

belly-drum.name: belly-drum
belly-drum.description: The user maximizes its ATTACK stat at the cost of half its full HP.

scratch.name: scratch
scratch.description: Hard, pointed, and sharp claws rake the foe.

thunderbolt.name: thunderbolt
thunderbolt.description: A strong electrical attack that may also leave the foe paralyzed.

fury-swipes.name: fury-swipes
fury-swipes.description: The foe is raked with sharp claws or scythes two to five times.

bounce.name: bounce
bounce.description: The user bounces on the foe on the 2nd turn. It may paralyze the foe.

mirror-move.name: mirror-move
mirror-move.description: The user counters the move last used by the foe with the same move.

spike-cannon.name: spike-cannon
spike-cannon.description: Sharp spikes are fired at the foe to strike two to five times.

ancient-power.name: ancient-power
ancient-power.description: An ancient power is used to attack. It may also raise all the user’s stats.

flatter.name: flatter
flatter.description: Flattery is used to confuse the foe, but its SP. ATK also rises.

iron-tail.name: iron-tail
iron-tail.description: An attack with a steel-hard tail. It may lower the foe’s DEFENSE stat.

bubble-beam.name: bubble-beam
bubble-beam.description: A spray of bubbles strikes the foe. It may lower the foe’s SPEED stat.

cosmic-power.name: cosmic-power
cosmic-power.description: The user absorbs a mystic power to raise its DEFENSE and SP. DEF.

thunder-punch.name: thunder-punch
thunder-punch.description: The foe is punched with an electrified fist. It may leave the foe paralyzed.

absorb.name: absorb
absorb.description: An attack that absorbs half the damage it inflicted to restore HP.

gust.name: gust
gust.description: Strikes the foe with a gust of wind whipped up by wings.

revenge.name: revenge
revenge.description: An attack move that gains in intensity if the target has hurt the user.

dragon-breath.name: dragon-breath
dragon-breath.description: The foe is hit with an incredible blast of breath that may also paralyze.

dizzy-punch.name: dizzy-punch
dizzy-punch.description: The foe is hit with a rhythmic punch that may leave it confused.

moonlight.name: moonlight
moonlight.description: Restores the user’s HP. The amount of HP regained varies with the weather.

icy-wind.name: icy-wind
icy-wind.description: A chilling wind is used to attack. It also lowers the SPEED stat.

ingrain.name: ingrain
ingrain.description: The user lays roots that restore HP on every turn. It can’t switch out.

explosion.name: explosion
explosion.description: The user explodes to inflict terrible damage even while fainting itself.

dream-eater.name: dream-eater
dream-eater.description: Absorbs half the damage it inflicted on a sleeping foe to restore HP.

glare.name: glare
glare.description: The user intimidates the foe with the design on its belly to cause paralysis.

conversion-2.name: conversion-2
conversion-2.description: The user changes type to make itself resistant to the last attack it took.

megahorn.name: megahorn
megahorn.description: A brutal ramming attack delivered with a tough and impressive horn.
